articles.author: Nikita Prasad
articles.title: Sensex @80K: Power Grid to UltraTech Cement — 13 stocks outperformed Sensex in H12024; Check full list | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Sensex @80K: Sensex breached the 80,000-mark from 70,000 in a record 58 market sessions, the fastest-ever 10,000-point climb in its history.
articles.content: The 30-share BSE Sensex is hovering above the Mount 80,000-mark, which the index first achieved on July 3, fuelled by its fastest-ever 10,000-point bullish rally in a record 58 sessions. The top 10 b… [+5970 chars]
